items.sentence: I hope I haven\'t said anything inappropriate.
I hope Tom isn\'t going to be the one driving.
Tom couldn\'t seem to get Mary to stop crying.
Tom needs to be told that he needs to do that.
Tom never expects a straight answer from Mary.
Tom never said he would let us borrow his car.
Tom said he wants to do everything by himself.
Tom said that he wanted to borrow a few books.
People can be judged by the company they keep.
When was the last time that you had a day off?
Tom is very good at kissing according to Mary.
Tom is waiting for you in the conference room.
Did I tell you I saw a big rat in the kitchen?
Several people in our office can speak French.
There aren\'t many books on these bookshelves.
Tom isn\'t nearly as smart as he thinks he is.
Tom isn\'t quite as reliable as he used to be.
Tom wanted to pull the trigger, but couldn\'t.
You aren\'t expecting Tom to do that, are you?
You aren\'t going to let Tom do that, are you?
